video.title: The 4400
video.synopsis: 4400 people who vanished over the course of five decades suddenly reappear. None have aged, and slowly it's revealed that they have mysterious powers.

episodes.synopsis: A comet is due to pass by Earth, but its trajectory changes to a collision course, causing widespread panic. But then the comet appears to slow down.
episodes.title: Pilot: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The 4400 returnees have been missing from months to years. None have any memory of where they've been, and some are manifesting paranormal abilities.
episodes.title: Pilot: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Carl Morrissey is a lowly supermarket employee who happens to be one of the 4400. He uses his new found powers to become a vigilante.
episodes.title: The New and Improved Carl Morrissey

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Diana are sent out to investigate a homicide that resembles the MO of a serial killer who was never caught or heard from for 21 years.
episodes.title: Becoming

episodes.synopsis: The 4400 are attacked by a series of bombings after Barbara Yates makes their names and addresses known to the public.
episodes.title: Trial by Fire

episodes.synopsis: Tom is furious after finding out that Lytell has taken his son, Kyle, into custody. Diana offers to help him in getting Kyle back.
episodes.title: White Light

episodes.synopsis: After a period of intense medical observation, Tom has returned to NTAC in a limited capacity, assigned only to desk duty.
episodes.title: Wake-Up Call, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Tom has returned to NTAC in a limited capacity.
episodes.title: Wake-Up Call, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Gary Navarro, a minor league baseball player, finds that he is hearing everyone's unspoken thoughts.
episodes.title: Voices Carry

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Diana investigate Trent Appelbaum, a 4400 whose saliva causes rapid acceleration of a person's metabolism.
episodes.title: Weight of the World

episodes.synopsis: A school teacher terrifies parents with her ability to inspire talents within students. Meanwhile, Richard and Lily are confronted by police.
episodes.title: Suffer the Children

episodes.synopsis: Maia sees a vision of Jordan Collier's death, and Kyle's frightening blackouts are disrupting Tom's personal life.
episodes.title: As Fate Would Have It

episodes.synopsis: When Tom arrives at NTAC, he learns that no one has ever heard of the 4400. Tom and Diana track down a man to a museum.
episodes.title: Life Interrupted

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Diana investigate a 4400 who has released a plague that has wiped out an entire town's population.
episodes.title: Carrier

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Diana investigate Edwin Mayuya, a 4400 who has the ability to heal damaged fetal chromosomes while in utero.
episodes.title: Rebirth

episodes.synopsis: NTAC follows a series of clues that lead them to Jordan Collier's killer. Tom faces a difficult choice.
episodes.title: Hidden

episodes.synopsis: A 4400 launches a terrorist attack against NTAC that causes the males to revert to their primal instincts.
episodes.title: Lockdown

episodes.synopsis: 4400s across the world are coming down with strange and life-threatening illnesses. Tom and Diana learn a horrible secret.
episodes.title: The Fifth Page

episodes.synopsis: Discovering that NTAC is behind the disease plaguing the 4400s, Tom and Diana try to get to the bottom of NTAC's cover-up.
episodes.title: Mommy's Bosses

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Diana, with the help of Gary Navarro, try to track down T.J. Kim, a 4400 whose ability caused a man to stab Dennis.
episodes.title: The New World: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Gary Navarro is arrested after attempting to assassinate Dennis Ryland. Isabelle attempts suicide.
episodes.title: The New World: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: T.J. Kim is murdered, and Tom is accused of committing the murder. Shawn and Isabelle grow closer.
episodes.title: Being Tom Baldwin

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Diana search for someone who is kidnapping young 4400s. Shawn is threatened by the Nova Group.
episodes.title: Gone: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: While in one of Alana's fantasies, Tom and Alana see Maia, though they have no memory of her existence. Diana's life is threatened.
episodes.title: Gone: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Isabelle seeks revenge on the Nova Group after they attack Shawn. Alana confronts the man responsible for killing her husband and son.
episodes.title: Graduation Day

episodes.synopsis: With Dennis Ryland's help, NTAC tracks down the remaining members of the Nova Group. Nikki pays Shawn an unexpected visit.
episodes.title: The Home Front

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Diana are drugged with a hallucinogen, which was created from an oil secreted from the hands of a 4400.
episodes.title: Blink

episodes.synopsis: Kevin Burkhoff becomes a marked man when his research on promicin is discovered. Tom and Diana search for Kevin.
episodes.title: The Ballad of Kevin and Tess

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Diana's investigation into a series of gruesome murders leads them to uncover another conspiracy within the government.
episodes.title: The Starzl Mutation

episodes.synopsis: NTAC and the 4400 Center work together to find Jordan Collier. Kyle Baldwin gets a surprising visitor at the state prison.
episodes.title: The Gospel According to Collier

episodes.synopsis: Nova Group members that were in the custody of NTAC escape from jail with outside help from Jordan Collier.
episodes.title: Terrible Swift Sword

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Diana continue their investigation on Jordan Collier's plan for mankind. Dennis Ryland returns to NTAC.
episodes.title: Fifty-Fifty

episodes.synopsis: A high school student develops an ability after injecting promicin. Tom visits Isabelle in jail, while Diana searches for her missing sister.
episodes.title: The Wrath of Graham

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Diana search for a person who has the ability to make people's worst fears come to life. Danny seeks Shawn's help in finding a promicin shot.
episodes.title: Fear Itself

episodes.synopsis: After she is murdered, Audrey Parker attempts to use the special abilities she had in life to lead Tom and Diana to her killer.
episodes.title: Audrey Parker's Come and Gone

episodes.synopsis: April's new ability endangers her life. Shawn is approached to run for public office, while Kyle helps Isabelle.
episodes.title: The Truth and Nothing but the Truth

episodes.synopsis: After realizing Tom knows he is promicin-positive, Kyle joins Jordan in a remote town called Evanston.
episodes.title: Try the Pie

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Diana search for Curtis Peck, a 4400 film maker whose ability allows him to "know" the truth behind historical conspiracies.
episodes.title: The Marked

episodes.synopsis: Jordan and his followers annex a run-down part of Seattle, dubbing it "Promise City." Shawn's campaign for city council is threatened.
episodes.title: Till We Have Built Jerusalem

episodes.synopsis: A lockdown at NTAC threatens the lives of Tom, Diana, Meghan, Shawn, Kyle, Jordan, Isabelle, Maia, Marco, PJ and Brady.
episodes.title: No Exit

episodes.synopsis: Richard kidnaps Isabelle from Collier's Promise City. Richard hopes to start a new life with his daughter.
episodes.title: Daddy's Little Girl

episodes.synopsis: The Director of National Intelligence pressures NTAC to pursue Richard and Isabelle. Richard is visited by his dead wife, Lily.
episodes.title: One of Us

episodes.synopsis: A computer virus attacks a large software company owned by a suspected member of The Marked. Maia visits Promise City.
episodes.title: Ghost in the Machine

episodes.synopsis: Isabelle works with Tom in order to get close to Jordan. Shawn recruits a small band of promicin positives to break Kevin out of Promise City.
episodes.title: Tiny Machines

episodes.synopsis: Danny Farrell's newfound ability to spread promicin leads to several hundred deaths, including his mother.
episodes.title: The Great Leap Forward
